author: Andy Buckingham <andy@aiir.com>
description: MVP Podcast Pingback receiver suitable for deployment as an AWS Lambda function
name: @aiir/podcast-pingback-receiver

scripts.package: mkdir -p lambda-package && rm -rf lambda-package/* && cp index.js package.json package-lock.json lambda-package/ && cd lambda-package && npm install --production && rm package.json package-lock.json
